title: Happy New Year, MacarMo
overview: Lu Xiaomu, the inheritor of the intangible cultural heritage of Huamomo, and Ren Yaqi, a pastry chef who returned from abroad, unexpectedly reunite through a series of comical blind dates. Together, they create the MacarMo, a fusion of Eastern and Western flavors. As their fake relationship turns into real affection, they find a harmonious balance between tradition and innovation, while also discovering love and chasing their dreams together.
